TestCase.name: insert customer values
TestCase.Resource: insert into customer values (149601, 'Customer#000149601', 'rsARKllazC', 18, '28-585-834-9749', 3932.16, 'BUILDING', 'arefully special deposits. silent deposits haggle. special, final deposits about the carefully unusual packa')

RwBatchInsertValues(table=[customer], values=[((149601,'Customer#000149601':CHAR(18),'rsARKllazC':CHAR(10),18,'28-585-834-9749':CHAR(15),3932.16:DECIMAL(28,10),'BUILDING':CHAR(8),'arefully special deposits. silent deposits haggle. special, final deposits about the carefully unusual packa':CHAR(108)))])

TestCase.name: q1
TestCase.Resource: select l_returnflag, l_linestatus, sum(l_quantity) as sum_qty, sum(l_extendedprice) as sum_base_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) as sum_disc_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount) * (1 + l_tax)) as sum_charge, avg(l_quantity) as avg_qty, avg(l_extendedprice) as avg_price, avg(l_discount) as avg_disc, count(*) as count_order from lineitem where l_shipdate <= DATE '1998-12-01' - INTERVAL '71' day group by l_returnflag, l_linestatus order by l_returnflag, l_linestatus;

RwBatchSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0, 1}], sum_qty=[SUM($2)], sum_base_price=[SUM($3)], sum_disc_price=[SUM($4)], sum_charge=[SUM($5)], avg_qty=[AVG($2)], avg_price=[AVG($3)], avg_disc=[AVG($6)], count_order=[COUNT()]) RwBatchProject(l_returnflag=[$4], l_linestatus=[$5], l_quantity=[$0], l_extendedprice=[$1], $f4=[*($1, -(1, $2))], $f5=[*(*($1, -(1, $2)), +(1, $3))], l_discount=[$2]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[<=($6, -(1998-12-01, 6134400000:INTERVAL DAY))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, lineitem]], columns=[l_quantity,l_extendedprice,l_discount,l_tax,l_returnflag,l_linestatus,l_shipdate])

TestCase.name: q6
TestCase.Resource: select sum(l_extendedprice * l_discount) as revenue from lineitem where l_shipdate >= date '1994-01-01' and l_shipdate < date '1994-01-01' + interval '1' year and l_discount between 0.08 - 0.01 and 0.08 + 0.01 and l_quantity < 24;

RwBatchSortAgg(group=[{}], revenue=[SUM($0)]) RwBatchProject($f0=[*($1, $2)]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[AND(>=($3, 1994-01-01), <(CAST($3):TIMESTAMP(0), +(1994-01-01, 12:INTERVAL YEAR)), OR(AND(>=($2, -(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2))), <=($2, +(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2)))), AND(>=($2, +(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2))), <=($2, -(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2))))), <($0, 24))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, lineitem]], columns=[l_quantity,l_extendedprice,l_discount,l_shipdate])
